item.title: Senior Associate, Disputes & Economics (.NET Developer) (Remote)
item.description: Ankura is a team of excellence founded on innovation and growth. Ankura is accepting applications for the Senior Associate position to support the Disputes & Economics business group - one of seven practices focused on client delivery services across the Firm. A Senior Associate is responsible for developing and maintaining software written using Microsoft .NET technologies to provide software consulting services to clients. The Senior Associate must be capable of assisting clients with complex information management and analysis challenges by combining software development techniques, sophisticated technology tools, and information management principles. Ankura provides Senior Associates with the opportunity to work collaboratively on diverse teams with other skilled, intelligent, and driven professionals. Ankura is focused on hiring Senior Associates who will serve as the foundation of a growing firm dedicated to its people, culture, and delivering high quality service to clients. ***This opportunity offers a flexible/hybrid work schedule that combines an on-premises (in the office) and remote environment.*** ESSENTIAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES: Senior Associates are intimately familiar with their clients' big-picture objectives and challenges as well as the smallest details of their organization’s data and IT infrastructure. With this knowledge you are responsible for designing and executing efficient, innovative analytical software solutions to address feature requests and troubleshoot issues. Responsibilities include, but are not limited to: Participating in the entire software development life cycle, designing, developing, configuring, and testing applications. Working with stakeholders to analyze system requirements, prioritize development tasks and plan releases. Performing day-to-day client engagement activities, including interaction with client personnel, internal Ankura team members, and other stakeholders REQUIRED SKILLS & CHARACTERISTICS: Experience with Full Stack Software development using C#, JavaScript, SQL (or another similar stack) Experience with (or desire to learn) Agile development methodologies Familiarity with source code control, code reviews and continuous integration Strong problem-solving and analytical skills Excellent communication (written and verbal), mathematical, and organizational skills Ability to produce high quality work while managing multiple/evolving tasks and/or re-prioritized deadlines Hard-working, self-motivated, thoughtful, collaborative, with a positive outlook and confidence Ankura is proud to be an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive environment where mutual respect and collaboration is paramount. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, disability, protected veteran status, national origin, or any other legally protected status.
